name: Glitchball
description: Glitchball is a 2D Vaporwave party-game that's like soccer.... but the ball kills you. Use your jetpack and shield to deflect the incoming glitchball to score goals, kill players, and compete for dominance in a chilled out dead mall.
minimum_requirements: OS: 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 350mb memory Storage: 260 MB available space
